alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 29 at 8:27AM HST until January 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ..HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .Several pulses of west-northwest (300 degrees) swell will arrive over the next couple of days. A medium-period swell peaking today will lead to high surf and then briefly diminish overnight. A more significant swell will bring even larger surf on Tuesday. This Advisory will likely be expanded in area later today, to include portions of Maui and the Big Island in anticipation of rising surf later tomorrow. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 18 feet along north facing shores, and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores today. Even higher surf is expected to develop on Tuesday as a new swell arrives. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Heed all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
